strapiEvent.name: U.S. Pro Cup Mountain Bike Series Returns To Fayetteville
strapiEvent.description:
For the third year in a row, Centennial Park in Fayetteville will attract cross-country mountain bikers from around the country for the 2023 U.S. Pro Cup set for April 12-16.

  • All levels: The four-day event will include cross-country mountain bike races for beginners, amateurs, and professionals and qualifying races for those hopeful athletes with eyes set on the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris.
  • New extremes: Fayetteville's world-class mountain bike course is the only North American race destination that offers hors categories, or uncategorizable, race opportunities that feature the longest, steepest, and most challenging routes for elite bikers looking to gain massive points.

Read more about this exciting event HERE.
